function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Seed each simulation by adjusting observed i t on the first day using country-specific estimates of case detection rates.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assuming an infection-fatality ratio of 0.75% without accounting for asymptomatic infections.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Estimating uncertainty by resampling from the estimated variance-covariance matrix of all regression parameters.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear impact of policy variables on infection growth rates immediately after deployment","category":"Policy risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible discrepancy between actual anti-contagion policies and their impact on infection or hospitalization growth rates","category":"Policy risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited sample size and data for analysis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cumulative cases reporting after 25 march 2020","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitivity of estimated averted/delayed infections to modeling assumptions","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of recovery/death rates in countries without direct observation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to covid-19 in multiple countries during the mentioned time periods.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of r2 values for fixed-lag lengths","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mis-coding of post-policy days as no-policy days","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small sample size in some countries","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through respiratory droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indirect transmission of covid-19 via contaminated surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with the use of copper as a virus-inactivating solution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to chemical and biological contaminants on push plates","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of antibacterial and antiviral properties in stainless steel surfaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Depositing copper coatings on push plates could create a false sense of security and lead to reduced hygiene practices.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate surface preparation and polishing of the copper-coated plates may impact the effectiveness of viricidal activity.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper handling of the cold spray system and copper powder can lead to exposure to toxic copper dust.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through surface contact","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate material characterization leading to improper use of materials","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient virucidal testing leading to ineffective virus inactivation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of sars-cov-2 contamination on metal surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral titre measurement and assay procedure may pose a risk of exposure to lab personnel","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Copper coating application process may pose a risk to workers","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of copper-coated surfaces for mitigating sars-cov-2 propagation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential difference between lab conditions and real-world scenarios for metal surface exposure. This could affect the effectiveness of copper in mitigating the spread of the virus.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the effectiveness of copper coatings on 3d-printed surfaces in inactivating the covid-19 virus.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varied efficacy of copper surfaces based on copper content and form native, nanoparticle raises concerns about the uniformity of antiviral properties across different copper materials.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contaminated steel push plates","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete inactivation of sars-cov-2 on copper-coated surfaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chemical composition of the copper coating","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through contact with contaminated surfaces in the built environment.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding in indoor spaces leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air exchange in enclosed spaces.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of covid-19 through the deployment and use of the cvid-19 digital signage system in public spaces.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of face mask detection in thermal imaging","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate body temperature measurement due to clothing interference","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low accuracy of thermal imaging for body temperature measurement","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprecedented pandemic outbreak","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly interconnected world facilitating rapid virus spread","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains and global economies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on globalization and economic growth as drivers of green investment and sustainable development","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accidental positive effects on the environment and natural ecosystems due to government-imposed measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thrusting business as usual into overdrive for economic recovery efforts","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The interplay with ce approaches may lead to increased risk of contagion in built environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recalibration of the global economic growth model from linear to circular economy could impact disease propagation.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced changes may provide opportunities for future resilience, but also present new risks of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
